column4: you run a minecraft server? the actual game or the free version?
actual server for licenced copy owners of minecraft
But my server is currently only in pre public release but if you would like to come visit its at. mynickname.com as the ip.
well by all means please stop by :) as long as you can get java working minecraft has a working linux version which should suffice. there is plenty of documentation on how to make it go.
